Articles.Content: As the title says, how much extra science have you accrued after maxing the tech tree? I've returned kerbals from every body except Eve, Bop and Pol, as well as stranding one kude on Tylo. Got most of the science available on the way, leaving me with over 18k science points and nothing to spend it on. I could always do more biome hopping on Kerbin and the Mun, pretty much done Minmus.
Well, keep stocking it up to pay for the NASA parts

Pfft NASA parts are gonna be like 3000 science...

Anyway, A few minutes ago I had 564 then something happened and I ended up with 552 which I used to research something... So I have 2 science right now..
Over 11k right now. Still getting ready to get samples from place I can visit.
About -2100, I've got a few nodes to unlock.
more than 3000 I guess,Im not traveling planetary lately,But when I go,I came home with samples.
None, I'm only halfway into Career in 0.23.
I had over 4k, but bought the top-tier Kerhane parts for 1k each. So right now I have a bit over 2k. Still have Moho, Jool, and Eeloo to probe. Only manned interplanetary return was to Duna/Ike.

31,331

I call hax.

u r 1337 h4x0r!!!1
I'm still working very hard on getting science to max out the tree. Real Solar System (no easy minmus!) really makes that a lot harder
